txt.en: 'Wolves in the Old Forest have always been something of a threat to foresters and woodsmen, but they've recently become more dangerous and aggressive. We don't want them coming into Buckland, so it would be best to hunt them down now in the Old Forest itself.\n\n'There is a tunnel through the High Hay, east of here.'
'I look forward to not hearing howls in the night. Thank you, [placeholder].'
'Howling wolves make for difficult sleeping. We need those beasts quieted and quickly.'
Berangar Highknoll needs your help reducing the threats from the Old Forest.
Defeated wolves in the western Old Forest ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat wolves in the western Old Forest ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
There is a tunnel into the Old Forest, east of his location between the High Hay and the stables.\n\nBerangar Highknoll has asked you to help reduce the number of wolves in the Old Forest.
Berangar Highknoll can be found near the entrance to the Old Forest between the High Hay and the stables in Buckland.\n\nBerangar Highknoll awaits word of your success.
